ce.stringProp: Take 1 tablet of Aspirin with water after meals.
Do not exceed 4 tablets in 24 hours.
If you experience nausea, stop using the medication and contact your physician.
Store the medication in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight.
Do not take this medication if you are allergic to NSAIDs.
Check with your doctor before taking if you have asthma or liver issues.
